C

Card - Class in Blackjack
 
Card(String, String) - Constructor for class Blackjack.Card
This method is given 2 strings, one that represents the rank and another one that represents the suit, and creates a Card object
cardHit(Card) - Method in class Blackjack.Player
This method takes a card as argument and adds it to the player's cards
checkBust() - Method in class Blackjack.Player
check if cardTotal bigger than 21 so the player looses
Client - Class in Blackjack
 
Client(String, int, String, String) - Constructor for class Blackjack.Client
This methods takes a string as argument and creates a client connected to the host + creates the GUI
close() - Method in class Blackjack.Dealer
